SEARCH
Package Characters.Romans

Class Legionnaire

java.lang.Object
Characters.Character
Characters.Romans.Roman
Characters.Romans.Legionnaire
public non-sealed class Legionnaire extends Roman
Represents a Roman Legionnaire, a standard soldier of the Roman army. Legionnaires can patrol, fight, and rest.

    • Legionnaire

      public Legionnaire(String name, Gender gender, double height, int age, int strength, int endurance, int health, int hunger, int belligerence, int levelMagicPotion, String legion)
      Constructs a new Legionnaire.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the legionnaire.
      gender - The gender.
      height - The height.
      age - The age.
      strength - The strength stat.
      endurance - The endurance stat.
      health - The initial health.
      hunger - The initial hunger.
      belligerence - The initial belligerence.
      levelMagicPotion - The magic potion level.
      legion - The name of the legion they belong to (e.g., "Legio I").

      public void patrol()
      Performs a patrol duty. Increases hunger and decreases endurance.

    • rest

      public void rest()
      Rests to recover endurance and reduce hunger. Sets the status to not in service.
